metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28796 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: jbd2_journal_wait_updates in fs/jbd2/transaction.c in the Linux kernelbefore 5.17.1 has a use-after-free caused by a transaction_t racecondition.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
